Field.Description:
Determines whether to make lesson available or not available for students to start.
NOTE: To schedule a lesson, de-select this option then click the 'Schedule Lesson' option from the lesson's drop down menu once you have added the lesson item.
Field.Name: LessonAvailable

Field.Description: Determines whether this lesson is scheduled or running indefinitely.
Field.Name: ScheduleLesson

Field.Description: The start date of the lesson.
Field.Name: StartDate

Field.Description: The end date of the lesson.
Field.Name: EndDate

Field.Description: The LAMS LessonID for the lesson
Field.Name: LessonID
